notes: Doesn't work with steam, but starts when you launch the executable with wine from the command line. Pretty laggy then, but maybe improvable with DXVK or a better PC ;-)
title: Defunct

notes: Was able to launch directly from Steam using Proton. Frame rate is a little jittery, but otherwise playable. Game seems to accept input from both event* and js* instances of the gamepad, leading to doubled inputs and some commands not working properly. Likely fixable.
title: Defunct
